Articles.Content:
Mission is lunar impact

No facility upgrades

Entries will be judged by tech level required with ties going to earliest date.  Points randomly assigned based off of the impressiveness. 2 categories revert and no reverts

 

I will be reattempting this in a new RP-0 career (failed it in my current career) just to see if I can actually do it.
Feels like it can be more than 4 sentences, a.k.a fleshed out.

Does this mean fulfilling the lunar impact contract, or just hitting the moon with something? It would be a lot easier to hit the moon with a dead probe core than a functional probe with batteries and an antenna, especially considering early cores can't shut down and you need 3 or 4 days of power.

@MaxL_1023 Both are acceptable.  That would fall under the impressiveness category.  My first attempt will probably try the shotgun method of spraying a bunch of decouples at the Moon and hoping 1 hits
Alright. Once RSS/RP-0 gets updated for 1.2.1 I will probably give this a try. It will be interesting to do this without the tracking station.

On 02/12/2016 at 10:36 PM, MaxL_1023 said:

Alright. Once RSS/RP-0 gets updated for 1.2.1 I will probably give this a try. It will be interesting to do this without the tracking station. 

I suspect you may be waiting a while for the whole of RP-0 to become 1.2 compatible...
